long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightroom Photo & Editor for Chrome is a powerful tool for photo and v editing that combines advanced editing features with user-friendly controls. Create stunning visual effects, enhance the quality of your media, and give your projects a professional touch directly from your Chrome browser





































Key Features:
Advanced Photo Editing: Adjust colors, contrast, brightness, and more to achieve the perfect look for your photos.
Video Editing: Trim, merge clips, and add visual and audio effects to create professional-looking videos.
Easy-to-Use Tools: The intuitive interface makes editing simple for both beginners and professionals.
Quick Optimization: Use ready-made filters and presets to instantly enhance your media.
Support for Various Formats: Edit photos and videos in a wide range of popular formats to suit your needs!
